objective.name: total_salary
objective.expr: quicksum(salary[c] * hire[c] for c in Candidates)
objective.description: Minimize total salary of hired candidates

constraints.name: budget_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(salary[c] * hire[c] for c in Candidates)
constraints.description: Total salary must not exceed budget

constraints.name: min_degree
constraints.description: At least one candidate with Master or PhD

constraints.name: min_experience
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(experience[c] * hire[c] for c in Candidates)
constraints.description: Total work experience of hired candidates must be at least 12 years

constraints.name: exclusive_A_E
constraints.description: At most one of A or E can be hired
